titleStmt.title: The miseries of inforst mariage As it is now playd by his Maiesties Seruants. By George Wilkins.
titleStmt.author: Wilkins, George, fl. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Jaggard] for George Vincent, and are to be sold at his shop in Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The miseries of inforcst mariages.
Variant: the device on the title page is upside-down.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
